characteristics.climate: Diverse, ranging from tropical in the foothills to glacial at peaks
characteristics.vegetation: Varied, including cloud forests and high-altitude grasslands
characteristics.precipitation: Varied, generally wetter in the lower altitudes
elements: Earth Immovable foundation, embodying strength and permanence.
Water Flowing lifeblood of the world, master of adaptation and change.
Air Invisible force of life, carrier of whispers and secrets.
Ice Frozen essence of winter, wielder of chilling touch and frostbite.
Wood Silent witness of time, carrier of life's cycle of growth and decay.
Life Sacred breath of existence, master of growth and healing.
Strength Unyielding resolve, the power to overcome all obstacles.
Perseverance The mountain climber, the spirit that never surrenders.
Adventure The call of the wild, the spirit of exploration and discovery.
